author: NICK PERRY
title: Tonga's internet finally restored 5 weeks after big eruption
description: WELLINGTON, New Zealand (AP) — Tonga's main internet connection to the rest of the world has finally been restored more than five weeks after a huge volcanic eruption and tsunami severed a crucial undersea cable.
